mapper.select: select i.i_name as 机构名称, tr_type.description as 业务种类, ii.CORE_SYS_CUSTOMER_CODE as 客户号, ii.i_fullname as 客户全称, tr.bnd_settype as 结算方式, tr.i_name as 项目资产代码, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordcount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 票面总额, tr.bnd_ytm * 100 as 到期收益率, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.bnd_netprice as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 净价金额, tr.setdate as 结算日期, tr.orddate as 交易日期, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordamount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 结算金额, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.bnd_aiamount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 总应计利息, tr.operator as 执行人, tr.trader as 交易确认人, instrument.p_class as 产品分类, 'T+' || to_char(tr.setdays) 清算速度, tr.intordid as 成交单编号, risk.p_name as 信用风险, cashlb.issuer as 实际用信人, cashlb.start_date as 起息日, cashlb.mtr_date as 到期日, case when cashlb.payment_freq = '0D' then '利随本清' when cashlb.payment_freq = '1Y' then '每年一次' when cashlb.payment_freq = '6M' then '半年一次' when cashlb.payment_freq = '3M' then '每季一次' when cashlb.payment_freq = '1M' then '每月一次' when cashlb.payment_freq = '-1' then '不结息' end as 付息频率, xmltype.getStringVal(xmltype.extract( extension.columns_ext,'/FVS/FV[@id="biz_honour"]/v/text()')) as 兑付日, xmltype.getStringVal(xmltype.extract( extension.columns_ext,'/FVS/FV[@id="biz_creditweight"]/v/text()')) as 授信权重 FROM TTRD_OTC_TRADE tr left join ttrd_instrument instrument on tr.i_code = instrument.i_code LEFT JOIN ttrd_auth_user u on tr.operator_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN TTRD_INSTITUTION i ON u.i_id = TO_CHAR(i.i_id) left join ttrd_institution ii on tr.partyid = ii.i_id LEFT JOIN ttrd_trade_type tr_type on tr.trdtype = tr_type.trd_type left join TTRD_CREDIT_RISK_REVIEW risk on risk.review_no = tr.seatno_cp left join TTRD_CASHLB cashlb on cashlb.i_code = tr.i_code and cashlb.m_type = tr.m_type and cashlb.a_type = tr.a_type left join ttrd_otc_biz_extension extension on extension.biz_id = (tr.i_code || ',' || tr.a_type || ',' || tr.m_type) and extension.biz_tablename = 'TTRD_CASHLB' where tr.sysordid = #{sysOrdId} and tr.ref_sysordid is null
